Aize Obayan (4 Maachị1960 29 Jenụwari 2019) bụ onye nchịkwa agụmakwụkwọ Naijiria na prọfesọ nke ndụmọdụ nwere ọkachamara n'akụkụ ọdịbendị dị iche iche nke Omume Mmadụ.
Obayan gara St Andrews Scotland maka ọkwa 'A' ya. O mechara gaa na nzere mbụ ya na B.Ed
(Bekee) na Mahadum Benin (Nigeria) n'etiti afọ 1979 na 1982. Obayan nwetara Ph.D

ya na Mahadum Ilorin, mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị UNILORIN were ya n'ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi enyemaka, na 1986, ọ rịgooro n'ọkwa ịghọ osote prọfesọ (AP) na 1995 ma tupu ọ banye na Mahadụ Ọgbụgba ndụ, ọ bụ onye nkuzi dị elu na Mahadwa Roehampton, UK.
Obayan jere ozi dị ka osote onye isi nke Mahadum ọgbụgba ndụ, Canaanland, Ota, Nigeria site na 2005 ruo Disemba  2012, mgbe Charles Ayo nọchiri ya
Ọ bụkwa osote chancellor nke Mahadum Landmark, Omu-Aran, Kwara State na onye nduzi nke African Leadership Development Centre na Mahadum Covenant.
Ọ lụrụ Adetokunbo Obayan nke ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ ndị isi Adetokunpo Obayan and Associates; ọ nwụrụ na 2017
Ha nwere ụmụ abụọ toro eto bụ Joshua na Toluwani. Ọ nwụrụ na 29 Jenụwarị 2019. Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst a mụrụ ọzọ.
